backend/main.mo: Actor canister managing clients, tasks, and user profiles with access control, per-caller storage maps, and CRUD APIs for the new Task model.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old task structures to the new Task model by mapping fields and initializing new optional fields to null.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking frontend files to implemented features such as bulk task upload, new task fields, and bulk editing.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing each frontend file’s purpose, including pages, dialogs, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color tokens, light/dark theme variables, and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, favicon, root mounting div, and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and authentication gating, rendering app layout and profile setup when needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new authenticated users to enter and save their display name via a profile creation form.
frontend/src/components/auth/SignedOutSc: Displays a branded sign‑in page with a login button and feature highlights, using Internet Identity for authentication.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientFo: Provides a dialog for creating, editing, and deleting clients with form validation and hooks for backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main application layout with navigation, mobile menu, user profile display, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskBulkEd: Allows bulk editing of selected tasks by updating only the fields filled in and submitting a collective update request.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskBulkUp: Handles CSV-based bulk task creation, including template download, file parsing, validation, and upload submission.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskFormDi: Dialog component for creating, editing, and deleting tasks with full form state and validation logic.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskQuickS: Compact status selector that updates a task’s status via mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/clients.ts: React Query hooks for fetching, creating, updating, and deleting clients via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/tasks.ts: React Query hooks for CRUD and bulk operations on tasks using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Hooks for retrieving and saving the current user's profile through the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity auth provider and hook managing login, logout, identity loading, and state.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables defining light and dark theme palettes.
frontend/src/lib/dataParser.ts: Utility functions to parse and encode client data fields into structured objects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React Query, Internet Identity, and rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/ClientDetailPage.tsx: Displays a single client's details, loads their tasks, handles loading/error states, and provides edit and task creation dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/ClientsPage.tsx: Shows a searchable, filterable list of clients with add-client functionality and loading/error handling.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders dashboard stats for clients and tasks, computing counts like active clients and overdue tasks.
frontend/src/pages/TasksPage.tsx: Provides a searchable, filterable, sortable task list with bulk selection, editing, deleting, and upload tools.
frontend/src/utils/taskCsv.ts: Implements CSV template generation and parsing with validation for bulk task uploads.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL params (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins for theming and container queries.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s state, versioning, feature list, and metadata for the task/client management app.
